title: sotelorene
author: sotelorene
content: Welcome to naija where pesin wey no get money they go borrow clothes and shoes just to comot go party,  pesin wey no get shishi go borrow clothes dey waka to impress people.  Pesin boss go give him driver make him go service or wash but e go shock you say driver go carry him boss car go flex and go come dey claim car owner. This country na cruise sha, you go see pesin wey no get house go dey claim big girl or big boy for street,  you no get food for house you dey select food mean while the pesin no even get something to eat. Too many things dey happen for this our country oooo but I come dey wonder waiting be the need of all those lifestyle.

comments.author: Makus
comments.body: Quote from: sotelorene on November 21, 2023, 05:59:42 PMWelcome to naija where pesin wey no get money they go borrow clothes and shoes just to comot go party,  pesin wey no get shishi go borrow clothes dey waka to impress people.  Pesin boss go give him driver make him go service or wash but e go shock you say driver go carry him boss car go flex and go come dey claim car owner. This country na cruise sha, you go see pesin wey no get house go dey claim big girl or big boy for street,  you no get food for house you dey select food mean while the pesin no even get something to eat. Too many things dey happen for this our country oooo but I come dey wonder waiting be the need of all those lifestyle. make i shock you say some persons no be say dem dey form, na just their normal lifestyle to dey select food even though say them never eat anything, dem prefer to stay hungry than to eat wattin dem no like, but the one wey pain me pass na those people wey their ogah give them car to go wash but dem go come end up using the car go flex and most times this flexing dey sabi purge dem, maybe the car go come get issue or get scratch and before you go know dem don loss the job wey dem dey manage. then concerning the cloths own i get one friend wey sabi live this kind of fake life, em go fit borrow both top and trouser like 5 from different persons take do fine boy. but i wan still clear your doubt say no be only naija this kind of things dey go on, na every where e dey most especially for this part of Africa.

comments.author: Agbamoni
comments.body: Teenagers and youths of these days they more attracted to finesse thangs. ( Drugs, Sex and Money). Just as Burnaboy call am "trabaye". If you no they leave this kind life you no fit, get best  freind again for the country. everybody wan go club, party they want feel among. As long as dey dey benefit one or two things from you from all these angle nah so they dey call you blood. E hard to actually there around all this peer influence but if you go fit withstand am then you go far for life. I feel like say people no care again, they just wan live the life untill death call their name. The life no easy and any money way dem get they want use am enjoy. But nah the wrong thing to do in my own opinion. The way i see life nah say as long as you they live make you they make plans just the same way you they enjoy yourself cos its a very big world and you need to prepare for the unexpected.

comments.author: rachael9385
comments.body: Quote from: sotelorene on November 21, 2023, 05:59:42 PMWelcome to naija where pesin wey no get money they go borrow clothes and shoes just to comot go party,  pesin wey no get shishi go borrow clothes dey waka to impress people.  Pesin boss go give him driver make him go service or wash but e go shock you say driver go carry him boss car go flex and go come dey claim car owner. This country na cruise sha, you go see pesin wey no get house go dey claim big girl or big boy for street,  you no get food for house you dey select food mean while the pesin no even get something to eat. Too many things dey happen for this our country oooo but I come dey wonder waiting be the need of all those lifestyle. The habits of borrow pose nah bad things because pesin dey do those things just to impress others, if nah man, I go say em dey try to impress girls but if nah woman I go say that nah just 0art of our life style.But truth be told, borrow pose nah bad thing, but the real matter be say, no be we start this fake life of a thing,,,,, I dey try to talk say this nah part of many pipo life style. Sometimes, many pipo just win feel among, more especially when them see their fellow mate dey do the kind of things way them never do before. For instance, of your friends dey go night club and and you never go before, based on say them dey always bring some kind of goodies and some gist way them go dey yan you. One day you self go like follow them go and if you go go, you self go like look good,,,, if you no get good cloths, you go like borrow to pose.But e no dey good,,, if you no get just try hustle to get.

comments.author: Makus
comments.body: Quote from: rachael9385 on November 21, 2023, 07:44:39 PM if nah man, I go say em dey try to impress girls but if nah woman I go say that nah just 0art of our life style.rechael see your mouth like "if nah man, I go say em dey try to impress girls but if nah woman I go say that nah just 0art of our life style". how e take be una normal lifestyle wey you sef no say na bad thing and una fit still hustle to make money wey go dey enough to fit buy some fancy cloths for bolling. the fact say na bad thing na for both boys and girls, beside una wey be girls own naim even worst pass because un dey very prone to infection, make you no go borrow cloth from friend wey get sweety but she never tell you ooo, because na so so scratch scratch you go just dey scratch body anywhere wey you go   .

comments.author: rachael9385
comments.body: Quote from: Makus on November 21, 2023, 08:14:23 PMQuote from: rachael9385 on November 21, 2023, 07:44:39 PM if nah man, I go say em dey try to impress girls but if nah woman I go say that nah just 0art of our life style.rechael see your mouth like "if nah man, I go say em dey try to impress girls but if nah woman I go say that nah just 0art of our life style". how e take be una normal lifestyle wey you sef no say na bad thing and una fit still hustle to make money wey go dey enough to fit buy some fancy cloths for bolling. the fact say na bad thing na for both boys and girls, beside una wey be girls own naim even worst pass because un dey very prone to infection, make you no go borrow cloth from friend wey get sweety but she never tell you ooo, because na so so scratch scratch you go just dey scratch body anywhere wey you go   .     ,,,, What de fuck are you saying? If you don't understand what I am trying to say,,, you better not quote my comments bro.I don't mean it is good for women to borrow pose but nowadays it is something that is just normal just the way most men are smoking the hell out of themselves.Borrowing is not good and it is something that no one should try to partake on.Talking about an infection,, are you trying to say that it is only the women that do get infected easily? If that's what you are thinking then you are apparently wrong because even the men do get infected and still pass it on to their wife's or their girlfriends after getting it from some of their concubines

comments.author: Dripplurd
comments.created_time: November 21, 2023, 08:46:18 PMLast edit: December 20, 2023, 06:08:33 AM by Dripplurd
comments.body: Quote from: Makus on November 21, 2023, 07:24:13 PMQuote from: sotelorene on November 21, 2023, 05:59:42 PMWelcome to naija where pesin wey no get money they go borrow clothes and shoes just to comot go party,  pesin wey no get shishi go borrow clothes dey waka to impress people.  Pesin boss go give him driver make him go service or wash but e go shock you say driver go carry him boss car go flex and go come dey claim car owner. Too many things dey happen for this our country oooo but I come dey wonder waiting be the need of all those lifestyle. make i shock you say some persons no be say dem dey form, na just their normal lifestyle to dey select food even though say them never eat anything, dem prefer to stay hungry than to eat wattin dem no like, but the one wey pain me pass na those people wey their ogah give them car to go wash but dem go come end up using the car go flex and most times this flexing dey sabi purge dem, maybe the car go come get issue or get scratch and before you go know dem don loss the job wey dem dey manage. then concerning the cloths own i get one friend wey sabi live this kind of fake life, em go fit borrow both top and trouser like 5 from different persons take do fine boy. but i wan still clear your doubt say no be only naija this kind of things dey go on, na every where e dey most especially for this part of Africa. Make i suprise you bro,na for naija you go see 2 guys wey they share the same dress just to impress people, na only god knows why em no give some people money for naija if not this country will have been worster than how it is now because the of kind life wey some of  them wan live for this our naija no be small thing, the one wey they pain me pass na em be say some of them sef no go wan do waiting there power reach na em even make stealing plenty for our naija now.

comments.author: Spaceman1000$
comments.body: Quote from: sotelorene on November 21, 2023, 05:59:42 PMWelcome to naija where pesin wey no get money they go borrow clothes and shoes just to comot go party,  pesin wey no get shishi go borrow clothes dey waka to impress people.  Pesin boss go give him driver make him go service or wash but e go shock you say driver go carry him boss car go flex and go come dey claim car owner. This country na cruise sha, you go see pesin wey no get house go dey claim big girl or big boy for street,  you no get food for house you dey select food mean while the pesin no even get something to eat. Too many things dey happen for this our country oooo but I come dey wonder waiting be the need of all those lifestyle. According to them, they say fake it till you make it. Omo I just don't understand why, some person's no go just live within their means, just to appear rich in the eyes of the public that don't give a damn about them and whatever they have to offer.Such kind of life will end of leading those person's into criminal act whenever they don't have the means to sponsor or maintain that exotic lifestyle.

comments.author: Baki202
comments.body: Quote from: Agbamoni on November 21, 2023, 07:27:53 PMTeenagers and youths of these days they more attracted to finesse thangs. ( Drugs, Sex and Money). Just as Burnaboy call am "trabaye". If you no they leave this kind life you no fit, get best  freind again for the country. everybody wan go club, party they want feel among. As long as dey dey benefit one or two things from you from all these angle nah so they dey call you blood. E hard to actually there around all this peer influence but if you go fit withstand am then you go far for life. I feel like say people no care again, they just wan live the life untill death call their name. The life no easy and any money way dem get they want use am enjoy. But nah the wrong thing to do in my own opinion. The way i see life nah say as long as you they live make you they make plans just the same way you they enjoy yourself cos its a very big world and you need to prepare for the unexpected. my brother everybody wants to look clean with person cloth and  no be say anything they wrong with say make you like fine thing oh but make everybody know him pocket if you no fit afford am na to live the thing the way he they but to they borrow I no they that one, drugs and money worst because people especially young people fit go any lent just say they wan get money na the course be that, if them done get money the next thing na to enter club go party. and just because they want to enjoy life does no mean say make them live their life recklessly na make we they try watch every step we they take for life.

comments.author: Antotena
comments.body: Quote from: sotelorene on November 21, 2023, 05:59:42 PMWelcome to naija where pesin wey no get money they go borrow clothes and shoes just to comot go party,  pesin wey no get shishi go borrow clothes dey waka to impress people.  Pesin boss go give him driver make him go service or wash but e go shock you say driver go carry him boss car go flex and go come dey claim car owner. This country na cruise sha, you go see pesin wey no get house go dey claim big girl or big boy for street,  you no get food for house you dey select food mean while the pesin no even get something to eat. Too many things dey happen for this our country oooo but I come dey wonder waiting be the need of all those lifestyle. This is not a lifestyle by naija alone, it's a normalize life you see even outside naija because people try to show what they really not are, they want to impress people when they don't have nothing and I see that as nothing but inferiority complex.It doesn't have age bracket, it can happen to people who suffer from peer pressure, people who try to impress women that are not their class but will go a lengthy leg to want be part of their life, people who want to show off their financial status when they don't have nothing in their bank account. Some of them even borrow car to take a girl on a date just to fell among and I get sick on this simping lifestyle.However, I don't blame people who do this sometimes. When you show the world that you are doing the right thing and you are not there yet, nobody will take you serious. People want to live the present in the future and in a society when there are not plenty of opportunities, compromised is the only alternative and no wonder we have now high numbers of fraudsters(yahoo-yahoo) in the country, may God help us.

comments.author: Stable090
comments.body: Quote from: sotelorene on November 21, 2023, 05:59:42 PMWelcome to naija where pesin wey no get money they go borrow clothes and shoes just to comot go party,  pesin wey no get shishi go borrow clothes dey waka to impress people.  Pesin boss go give him driver make him go service or wash but e go shock you say driver go carry him boss car go flex and go come dey claim car owner. I no sabi Wetin people dey get from that fake life wey dem dey leave, you no get something, y u go come dey pretend, but I know say Wetin dey make guys dey do that one na mostly because of women, but d most surprising part is how people dey fit maintain that kin life. And mostly girls dey leave that kin life so that if guys see dem, guys go dey reason say na big girl them be, and some dey do am just to make their friends feel jealous, but na rubbish me I see things like dis as. I dey hear am say dem dey rent even complete building for Abuja for like one day, and even cars dem dey rent. If you just wan impress girl you fit just rent house and car for one day, if d girl come she go think say na u get am, but na rubbish all those things be jare.

comments.author: SmartCharpa
comments.body: Quote from: sotelorene on November 21, 2023, 05:59:42 PMWelcome to naija where pesin wey no get money they go borrow clothes and shoes just to comot go party,  pesin wey no get shishi go borrow clothes dey waka to impress people.  Pesin boss go give him driver make him go service or wash but e go shock you say driver go carry him boss car go flex and go come dey claim car owner. This country na cruise sha, you go see pesin wey no get house go dey claim big girl or big boy for street,  you no get food for house you dey select food mean while the pesin no even get something to eat. Too many things dey happen for this our country oooo but I come dey wonder waiting be the need of all those lifestyle. I don't know say you sef reason am oo, some people with fake life na 5&6, you know say fake life sef still get level, some people they on a norms their lifestyle them fit get money to dey drip, but shishi no fit they their pockets to take chop, this kind thing dey happen everywhere, you know say for their mind, they are think that person wey no dey drip woman no dey follow am, and for girls dey feel like say, girl wey no dey classic no fit get better men wey go follow them, how do they even comfortable they borrow person clothes wear, they no fit see them with the cloth another time, but they no send, you know we naija anybody wey dey leave fake life, if you are not close to them you won't know that they are faking everything in their lives.For naija e no get any surrounding wey be say person dey without anybody leaving fake life, they con get one guy wey i sabi him very well well, leaving fake life wearing people clothes, he want to leave like his other friends in school, telling people say na oyinbo him dey scam, all this lie from people wey never see even $5 collect before    the day wey me and the guy con get chance seat down, him just dey tell me say nothing dey this life na to leave fake life, like i just laugh and everybody believe say na oyinbo him dey scam, to extent wey be say people dey ask am for update.

comments.author: Makus
comments.body: Quote from: rachael9385 on November 21, 2023, 08:33:11 PM   ,,,, What de fuck are you saying? If you don't understand what I am trying to say,,, you better not quote my comments bro.Abeg oo, I no mean to offend anybody oo, after all na wattin you post naim I talk about oo, I no go manipulate text from anywhere, exactly the way you post am, na just copy and paste I do come quote you oo, besides I just write that thing for fun sake, no be say I mean to talk say you dey fully support the girls for wattin dem dey do. The only problem I get na as you talk say for the girls na just normal lifestyle while for the boys na to use am take impress girls, but the truth na be say you no go fit just exclude girl for using cloths to impress the opposite sex, in fact girls dey use am to seduce boys, period.Quote from: rachael9385 on November 21, 2023, 08:33:11 PMTalking about an infection,, are you trying to say that it is only the women that do get infected easily? If that's what you are thinking then you are apparently wrong because even the men do get infected and still pass it on to their wife's or their girlfriends after getting it from some of their concubines  Yes in mean it, based on study and real life experience it is know to be so, and there is nothing that can change that, females are very open and fragile, that why the are some times called the weaker vessels. Beside you even made it clear that men would pass infections to their wife's or girlfriend from their concubines

comments.author: Kensure
comments.body: These no be new matter again na lol .welcome to Nigeria .for Nigeria now na fake it it till you make it oh.in Nigerian people borrow cars,clothes,houses,shoes,bags even hairs just to impress their fans .and there is one thing with this fake life ,when you start it ,it becomes very difficult for you to stop .each and every day you would want to level up.this very common with women, these genders ready to do everything possible just to meet up.that one no mean say man Dey innocent.as a result of the fake life some people are now under pressure,they end up doing things that is unpleasant to the society just to meet up with there fake life.we no really know who be who again for this country again.But one thing I go like advice be say ,as youth make we try they cut our coat according to our material,so we don’t  get into trouble.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Make I put mouth for this talk with my own 2 cent advice,  which is very simple and it will help a lot of us form unnecessary pressures. 1: we should be contented with whatever we have,  and also we should leave below our means and not leave or appear to impress anyone,  one of the measure causes of borrow posna because the person no want leave within him means and ability rather he prefer to fake it which will do more harm than good,  because a lot of time,  such lifestyle chase helpers away from you without you even knowing,  this is is most cases where your helper may even think that is them that even need your own help,  that is suffering and smilling. 2: trying to be in competition with other,  this na another reason why some people the borrow be that,  some want to match up with their friends so you see them borrowing cloths,  shoes and even under wears just to belong to a class where ordinary their are not,  this is why many of them fall victims to a lot of negative views at the end.

comments.author: DaNNy001
comments.body: Quote from: sotelorene on November 21, 2023, 05:59:42 PMWelcome to naija where pesin wey no get money they go borrow clothes and shoes just to comot go party,  pesin wey no get shishi go borrow clothes dey waka to impress people.  Pesin boss go give him driver make him go service or wash but e go shock you say driver go carry him boss car go flex and go come dey claim car owner. This country na cruise sha, you go see pesin wey no get house go dey claim big girl or big boy for street,  you no get food for house you dey select food mean while the pesin no even get something to eat. Too many things dey happen for this our country oooo but I come dey wonder waiting be the need of all those lifestyle. The feeling to be among the elite social groups is not only common in Nigeria alone, my brother this habit sometimes na due to peer pressure influence and many youth of this age dey always fall to am. Fake life dey always cast and it's not necessary because instead of living a pretentious life, try struggling and living your life as simple as you can and go on with flow and Wait for your turn to come.

comments.author: Hewlet
comments.body: Quote from: sotelorene on November 21, 2023, 05:59:42 PMWelcome to naija where pesin wey no get money they go borrow clothes and shoes just to comot go party,  pesin wey no get shishi go borrow clothes dey waka to impress people.  Pesin boss go give him driver make him go service or wash but e go shock you say driver go carry him boss car go flex and go come dey claim car owner. This country na cruise sha, you go see pesin wey no get house go dey claim big girl or big boy for street,  you no get food for house you dey select food mean while the pesin no even get something to eat. Too many things dey happen for this our country oooo but I come dey wonder waiting be the need of all those lifestyle. you done hear the phrase "fake it until you become it?" Baba, some people de fake am so when de finally get the money e no go had them to live the kind of life them been done de fake. If na just to borrow car or cloth burst out event, I no too reason am as any big deal because even the oyibo when we de learn most things from de also buy car and with time de go de pay am small small. E De only get to me when I see person when no get shishi for account de form unnecessary when we see others. You see those boys when he carry bottle water everywhere eh, most of them no even get one room apartment when dem de stay, some of them no de even drink sat her water for there house but when he burst out like this De go shut down the street then go back house go sip garri.

comments.author: Y3shot
comments.body: Quote from: sotelorene on November 21, 2023, 05:59:42 PMWelcome to naija where pesin wey no get money they go borrow clothes and shoes just to comot go party,  pesin wey no get shishi go borrow clothes dey waka to impress people.  Pesin boss go give him driver make him go service or wash but e go shock you say driver go carry him boss car go flex and go come dey claim car owner. This country na cruise sha, you go see pesin wey no get house go dey claim big girl or big boy for street,  you no get food for house you dey select food mean while the pesin no even get something to eat. Too many things dey happen for this our country oooo but I come dey wonder waiting be the need of all those lifestyle. People like this don believe say na with fake like this they fit meet up. Bit this is a useless lifestyle faking a life and claiming wetin you be, instead of living a fake life it is better to work hard and get something real that you can prove people it was earned from you. People who dey live fake life to impress people I still dey wonder how long they want lieve this fake life, if they wan live this their fake life forever, it is impossible because living fake like get it own consequences because e dey later backfire.  Giving people that you have it all is making them that you are okay with all you have and when you go need help from people them fit no reason you again.

comments.author: Mpamaegbu
comments.body: Quote from: sotelorene on November 21, 2023, 05:59:42 PMThis country na cruise sha, you go see pesin wey no get house go dey claim big girl or big boy for street...Dat wan enta BlessingCEO well for body. She go use persin house pose as na she get am for social media and the real owner got her arrested. The worse part be sey na most of those people wey our youths dem dey worship as their role models dey do dat type of thing pass. Borrow pose. Dat attitude crisscross d entire human race, nor be only Nigerians dey do am. For me, anybody wey dey do am nor be principled person. In fact, the persin na mumu because im suppose sabi sey e nor good to lead ur life to please anyone.

comments.author: Youngkhngdiddy
comments.body: Quote from: sotelorene on November 21, 2023, 05:59:42 PMWelcome to naija where pesin wey no get money they go borrow clothes and shoes just to comot go party,  pesin wey no get shishi go borrow clothes dey waka to impress people.  Pesin boss go give him driver make him go service or wash but e go shock you say driver go carry him boss car go flex and go come dey claim car owner. This country na cruise sha, you go see pesin wey no get house go dey claim big girl or big boy for street,  you no get food for house you dey select food mean while the pesin no even get something to eat. Too many things dey happen for this our country oooo but I come dey wonder waiting be the need of all those lifestyle.    Fake life na normal life for this country ooo. Everybody dey try impress everybody. Person go jus dey try live above him means, which dey very wrong. Girls especially, na Dem get hands for this kain thing, Dem wan be like, Dem wan feel among, you borrow everything for party wey nothing comot or to go catch man by deceit, the same man wey go follow catch you by deceit too. Sometimes peer pressure dey responsible for the fake life because why on earth would someone wey no hold wan dey act like say him hold. This country no dey better, people dey struggle to live through their normal life, na him person go just stay decide say him wan live the life wey big pass am.   We go hear say oga travel, leave house for gateman to look after, gateman get mind, call him irresponsible and unreasonable girls, lie to them say na him get am, sounds funny but na reality. Normally you dey try eat the little food wey you get for house, but as a guy wey dey expect girl, you go come go above your means to impress girl wey nothing fit comot wey you no even know if she too dey follow chop your normal routine for house. As a girl, you comot with man con use am as an opportunity to rip the guy apart financially, all because you wan show say class dey. E dey better to really dey contented o because if the economy no kee people for the country, na the thing wey yoruba people dey call "ojukokoro" go kee Dem.
